title: OCE Servers
body:
So for the past few days my game play has been relatively "pingy" and I have had very high ping spikes where everything practically freezes and it is not just my self but my friends are experiencing it as well. In the last game I couldn't connect at all amongst 3 other people in the same game who are playing from random places in OCE and now I get a notification that I have been put at low priority due to dodgy servers.

LOL OCE please get you servers back up to spec and don't punish us for your problems

cheers
Firejack

replies.body:
>"pingy"

Implies a super-fast connection where it is literally impossible to tell the time difference between your input and action on-screen. But I still get what you meant.

Servers have been having a bit of trouble recently that Riot doesn't seem to be aware of. Hell, the forums were unavailable for no reason just a second ago.

But no Loss Forgiven has been enabled. It's not a server crash, but a server lag. You're best just waiting until it's fix.
